# UArizona Data7 Exploratory Data Analysis In Python Book! {.unnumbered}

Here you will find a collection of materials prepared by the staff of the [Data Science Institute](https://datascience.arizona.edu/)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Exploratory data analysis in Python - Diagnosing like a data doctor

### Purpose of Materials

Exploring a novel data set and produce an HTML interactive reports

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Exploratory data analysis in Python - Exploring like a data adventurer

### Purpose of the Materials

Exploring the normality of numerical columns in a novel data set

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Exploratory Data Analysis in Python - Transforming like a Data... Transformer

### Purpose of the Materials

Using data transformation to correct non-normality in numerical data

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Exploratory Data Analysis in Python - Imputating like a Data Scientist

### Purpose of the Materials

Exploring, visualizing, and imputing outliers and missing values (NAs) in a novel data set

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Exploratory Data Analysis in Python - Correlate Like a Data Master

### Purpose of the Materials

Assess relationships within a novel data set
